title: did akali actually get nerfed in 5.9???
body:
Seems like akali's ult change so that she dashes behind the target isn't a buff at all. it takes her out of aa range requiring you to to walk to the target to aa them. 

Not only that but now in lane you cant put pressure on the enemy if they are near turret. if you q-r to them it places you in turret range and you get stomped. its like her laning phase has increased in difficulty by 10.
another example is if you put down your shroud and farm inside it, if they get too close and step inside the shroud and you go for the attack you are constantly jumping out of your shroud and have to run back in to re-stealth, in team fights it makes her way too vulnerable.

What inspired these changes anyway... as you can tell by my name i play akali alot and i never had any trouble aa them after i ult. now her game play just seems sloppy... idk that's my 2 cents, what do you guys think?

replies.body: Yeah could never understand how anyone thought it was actually a buff for the ult, just makes her more prone to being kited the entire game.

Yah bro. This change is really, really, really, really bad.. Like whoever came up with this change needs to be fired..

Akali's AA range is 125 units.. Her ult now places her 150 - 250 units behind the target.. Am i missing something crucial about this math here?

Like... This change might have worked well for her kit, if you could still proc Q with E. But, seeing as how Akali is absolutely dependent on getting that AA off as soon as possible once she ults into the crowd, this change was actually thee absolute biggest nerf they ever did to Akali.

It is reallllllly.......... reallllllllly............... bad though.. I just ulted to someone 3 times and got one mark off... You know why? Cuz all you have to do now is walk toward Akali as she ults. Her ult then spits her out so far behind you that she is forced to either walk back to you after ulting or simply ult again.. Could you imagine how incredibly bad this would get against a champion with any sort of movement speed enhance / dash to their kit (which nearly every champion has)?

So many champions in this game are still, to this day, **WAY **more overpowered then Akali. Why are we still picking on her? It was already hard enough getting that clunky ass auto attack off.. Now she is completely killed. Any competent player can literally perma dodge her mark.. GG Akali

Well done Riot. Another solid piece of shit update to Akali. As if the E not procing Q didn't make her clunky enough.

Like... this might just be one of the most incompetent changes they ever made to this game. The mechanics of her ult were as on-point as they possibly could be before this change.. The way her ult use to bring you to the target was literally 100% perfect.. Absolutely nothing wrong with it.

I use to be able to ult to someone who was standing directly on their turret agro line, and not take turret agro (in fact this was one of my main ways of solo killing people who thought they were safe under their turret). Now, I literally cant even ult to someone who is standing 250 units away from their turret agro line..?? WTF?? Are you even fcking kidding me?

I'm just curious to see how Riot is going to clean up this mess. They know E not procing Q was a shit tier change that completely destroyed the synergy of her abilities. Now they go and do this to try and redeem her, but end up making her 100x worse. Akali's gameplay is so sloppy now, she is almost unplayable and virtually incapable of executing the kind of plays that she needs to execute in order to win games.

These new ult mechanics are bugged to all hell as well. It rarely spits you out at a consistent distance away from your opponent. It is far too unpredictable to be healthy for her kit. This change clearly had no extensive testing prior to release.. How did this make it past PBE? No Akali mains on the PBE?
well hopefully riot will see this post and with enough concerned league players get the changes reverted because now she is truly broken..... totally unplayable as an assassin in the state shes in.

I dont see these changes as a nerf or a buff, the ult going behind allows you to dodge a lot of skillshots and i see it as a change in playstyle.

Da hell u on. Catch up with the new meta people. She works a bruiser now. Her dash behind is to cut off people fleeing, and its way better for running, its more of a chase and flee now, its not for damage anymore, its for utility. She works best now as ad/ap bruiser, but dat full ad with 40% cdr is insane, gg e 2 op

You guys apprently dont realize that Riot already recongnized this Akali change as a problem. Here is a more detailed post on the matter with links to videos and the riot devs twitter who is over seeing this change:

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/35ylsm/masterschallenger_akali_only_player_most_akali/

The problem is very evident in this guys videos.. When someone is walking toward someone it literally takes akali **longer** to get her mark off by ulting to them rather then just by simply continuing to walk straight towards them....

That alone is a **clear** and **obvious** fail. There's no other explanation for that other then it being 100% wrong. You cant be marking mofos faster by walking to them, then by ulting.. Akali's ult IS Akali. Without that, Akali is literally nothing.

P.S. Akali will always be a BURST DAMAGE ASSASSIN, not a f*cking bruiser.. Her kit scales way too effectively with AP to make any thing else on her viable. Not too mention the synergy of the current AP items.

IMO at least they didn't nerf her even more just as a final f*ck you to her as an entirety. You can dodge Ashe ulti's with ease, and Sion Q's.

It is annoying to trigger mark now. Change would be great if her shroud gave armor and MR still because her ultimate puts her way out of position now and if you R again to someone it puts you right in the path of AOES on your bruisers rather than just out of range.
